intro: Climb surreal dimensions in this rhythm game powered by high-energy electronic beats! 100+ stages, BPM 110-155 tracks, combos over 357! Extreme tempo awaits!
description:
Step into a vibrant pop world where rhythm meets sport climbing in a fresh, fast-paced action rhythm game. Dash up glowing climbing routes in time with the music using simple button controls, and feel the thrill of "grooving to the summit" as anyone can enjoy the rush of a perfect run. Tropical sunsets, snowy Christmas mountains, and neon-lit cityscapes create a constantly changing backdrop, while the combo counter, PERFECT judgments, and x6 score multiplier at the top of the screen make the moment your score explodes feel truly unforgettable. Choose your favorite tracks from a polished song-select UI and take on more than 100 stages packed with rhythm challenges.

Each stage you clear unlocks new songs and expands your very own "Rhythm Star Collection". Use coins and diamonds earned as rewards to buy and upgrade power-boosting items and gloves, then customize both appearance and abilities with accessories like headsets and wings. Four difficulty levels—Easy, Normal, Hard, and Challenge—ensure that everyone from beginners to rhythm-game veterans can find the perfect groove. Train a colorful cast of climbers, including a yellow-shirted explorer and a dancer in a festive Christmas outfit, and enjoy an addictive rhythm party with your own personal "Rhythm Star".

・A new-style action rhythm game that fuses music and sport climbing.
・Real-time combo counter and PERFECT judgments let you feel the rhythm's excitement across the whole screen.
・Over 100 stages and backgrounds, including tropical sunsets, Christmas nights, and neon city skylines.
・Intuitive song-select UI showing BPM and difficulty so you can quickly pick the track you want.
・Clearing stages unlocks new music and grows your "Rhythm Star Collection".
・Use coins and diamonds to purchase and upgrade gloves, boosting your power stat.
・Customize your character with a wide variety of accessories such as headsets, wings, and glowing auras.
・Original soundtrack featuring multiple genres, including 10 indie K-POP tracks, to enhance the rhythm experience.
・Short stage length makes it perfect for quick play sessions during commutes or breaks.

A colorful pop world, comical and lovable climbers, and a feel-good beat—"Crazy Stars Rhythm Party" is a rhythm party venue where everyone smiles the moment they pick up the controller. Ride the rhythm, race up the rock walls, and use the items and accessories you collect to create your very own ultimate Rhythm Star.

Story
On the pop planet "Rhythmia Star", all life moves to rhythm and beat, and the inhabitants use their "Rhythm Power" to climb walls as part of everyday life. At the very top of the world stands the "Grand Beat Tower", and only those who conquer its peak are honored as the "True Rhythm King".

One day, the planet's rhythm begins to fall into chaos and Rhythm Power starts to fade. In response, the council forms the legendary climber team "Crazy Stars". As one of its members, you set out to gather "Rhythm Crystals" across tropical cliffs, snowy mountains, and neon cities, opening the path to the Grand Beat Tower.

Chain combos to the beat, conquer over 100 stages, and claim the throne of the True Rhythm King.
